The [R extension](https://github.com/REditorSupport/vscode-R) for [VS Code](https://code.visualstudio.com/) has built-in support for `httpgd`:

![httpgd plot viewer in VS Code](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/33600480/147694280-c5272f76-6b12-4260-928a-d43565068f09.png)

See the [Plot viewer wiki page](https://github.com/REditorSupport/vscode-R/wiki/Plot-viewer) for setup instructions.
